feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.11
entry.content: • [Plex] Fixed Plex LOGIN via the user page, the setup page, and login page

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.12
entry.content:
• [Swappar] Able to change sleep time
  • [Swappar] Removed useless hover effect that caused a slight, annoying visual shift
  • [Apps] Removed useless hover effect that caused a slight, annoying visual shift

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.13
entry.content:
• [Swappar] Everything properly saves and added save button
  • [Note] Working to restore save buttons and remove auto-save

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.14
entry.content:
• [Settings] Auto-saved removed and save button added
  • [Notifications] Auto-saved removed and save button added
  • [Note] Continuing to remove auto-save for other areas

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.15
entry.content:
• [All Apps] Auto-saved removed and save button added
  • [Note] Removal of auto-save and save buttons added complete
